response.original_title: 女性如何拥有一首诗：进入内部是最佳的策略吗？
response.overview: Through the exploration of the spaces inside and outside art galleries, it reveals that feminism in artistic spaces is a conspiratorial pseudo-presence. Amid constant vacillation, it also blurs the boundary of this narrative between reality and the screen—and this is an alienated movement.
response.title: How can women own a poem: Is entering the inner space the best strategy?
